docs.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
docs.text:
👋 Hello! I'm Abhishek Tagalpallewar, a Mechanical Engineering student at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar.

During my first year, I’ve explored the fundamentals of several disciplines beyond mechanical engineering, from coding to world civilizations.

This portfolio highlights my journey of learning, building, and growing through projects, technical exploration, and teamwork.

🔍 In this portfolio, you’ll find:

  • 🛠️ Projects I’ve worked on

  • 💻 Skills in programming, tools, and technical knowledge

  • 🏆 Experiences in college events and collaborations

  • 📚 Hobbies that keep me inspired

  • 📬 Contact to get in touch

🎯 Current Focus: Exploring the intersection of mechanical engineering and software development.

docs.title: 📬 Contact Me
docs.text:
I’d love to connect! Whether you want to discuss a project, collaborate, or just say hi — feel free to reach out.

  • 📧 Email: tagal.abhi@gmail.com
  • 🌐 LinkedIn: Abhishek Tagalpallewar
  • 💻 GitHub: TagalpallewarAbhishek
  • 🕐 Typically replies within 1–2 days
  • 📍 Maharshtra, India

docs.title: 🛰️ Geospatial Insights Hub
docs.text:
🐍 Python 📊 Data Analysis & Visualization 📅 24 March, 2025

Exploratory analysis of Indian Pollution Dataset using Google Earth Engine Python API. 🔗 GitHub Repo

docs.title: 🌬️ Smart Servo-Controlled Fan
docs.text:
🔌 Arduino + Embedded Systems ⚙️ Circuit Design & Automation 📅 22 April, 2025

A smart fan system that detects user position using infrared (IR) sensors and automatically rotates using a servo motor to direct airflow. Built using an Arduino Uno, this embedded system enhances comfort and energy efficiency by activating only when motion is detected.

  • 📄 Download Project Report (PDF)
  • ▶️ Watch Demo on YouTube

docs.text:

Welcome! I'm currently pursuing my education at IIT Gandhinagar. This website showcases my projects, experiences, skills, and interests.

Feel free to explore the sections to learn more about me.
